content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":80791,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え……健太郎くん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh... Kentarou-kun?\""},{"lineNumber":80792,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You...?"},{"lineNumber":80793,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一緒に入るのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you going in together?\""},{"lineNumber":80794,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　駄目ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"? Is that not allowed?\""},{"lineNumber":80795,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいえ、二人分入れる装置もあります。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, there is also a device that can hold two people."},{"lineNumber":80796,"originalJapaneseLine":"　健太郎様さえよろしければ、","translatedEnglishLine":"If only Kentarou-sama is okay with it,"},{"lineNumber":80797,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうぞそちらへ。ｿｿｿ」","translatedEnglishLine":"please go ahead over there. *soso*\""},{"lineNumber":80798,"originalJapaneseLine":"「健太郎くん、いいの？　いいの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kentarou-kun, is it really okay? Really okay?\""},{"lineNumber":80799,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、どうせ僕魔人だから","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, since I'm a demon anyway,"},{"lineNumber":80800,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ずーっと待ってもいいけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"I could wait forever, but..."},{"lineNumber":80801,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただ待つだけなんて退屈だもんね」","translatedEnglishLine":"just waiting around would be boring, you know.\""},{"lineNumber":80802,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なら美樹ちゃんと一緒に寝て待つよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then I'll sleep and wait together with Miki-chan.\""},{"lineNumber":80803,"originalJapaneseLine":"「健太郎くん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kentarou-kun!\""},{"lineNumber":80804,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹が健太郎の首に抱きつく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki hugged Kentarou's neck."},{"lineNumber":80805,"originalJapaneseLine":"「健太郎くんっ、ごめんね……うっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kentarou-kun, I'm sorry... ugh..."},{"lineNumber":80806,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ごめんね……ごめんね……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm sorry... I'm sorry...!\""},{"lineNumber":80807,"originalJapaneseLine":"「美樹ちゃん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Miki-chan..."},{"lineNumber":80808,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ずっと一緒にいよう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's be together forever...\""},{"lineNumber":80809,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うんっ……うんっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah... yeah...!\""},{"lineNumber":80810,"originalJapaneseLine":"「美樹ちゃん……健太郎さん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Miki-chan... Kentarou-san...\""},{"lineNumber":80811,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……魔王の不在か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sigh... The Demon King's absence, huh...\""},{"lineNumber":80812,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、不満そうだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's wrong? You look displeased.\""},{"lineNumber":80813,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……サテラとしては複雑だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...As Satella, I have complicated feelings.\""},{"lineNumber":80814,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、それがリトルプリンセスの判断なら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But if that is the Little Princess's decision,"},{"lineNumber":80815,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラは口を挟めないからな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella cannot interfere...\""},{"lineNumber":80816,"originalJapaneseLine":"「日光、お前さんはどうする？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hikaru, what will you do?\""},{"lineNumber":80817,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":80818,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……私は外に残ります」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I will stay outside.\""},{"lineNumber":80819,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここに残って……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will remain here..."},{"lineNumber":80820,"originalJapaneseLine":"　美樹ちゃんの魔王化を止める手立て、","translatedEnglishLine":"to find a way to stop Miki-chan's demon transformation,"},{"lineNumber":80821,"originalJapaneseLine":"　必ず見つけなければいけないので」","translatedEnglishLine":"I absolutely must find it.\""},{"lineNumber":80822,"originalJapaneseLine":"「日光さん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hikaru-san...\""},{"lineNumber":80823,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬鹿だな、お前は」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're foolish.\""},{"lineNumber":80824,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大馬鹿者だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A great fool.\""},{"lineNumber":80825,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":80826,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあ、日光さんとは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, that means Hikaru-san and I..."},{"lineNumber":80827,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここでお別れなんだね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"will say goodbye here, right...?\""},{"lineNumber":80828,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, that's correct...\""},{"lineNumber":80829,"originalJapaneseLine":"「二人とも……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Both of you..."},{"lineNumber":80830,"originalJapaneseLine":"　長い間、お疲れ様でした……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Thank you for all your hard work over this long time...\""},{"lineNumber":80831,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この中にいれば……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you stay inside here..."},{"lineNumber":80832,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう魔王化に苦しむことも……","translatedEnglishLine":"you won't suffer from demon transformation anymore..."},{"lineNumber":80833,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人に恐れられて悲しむこともありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"and you won't have to be feared or saddened by others.\""},{"lineNumber":80834,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ゆっくりと休んで下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please rest slowly.\""},{"lineNumber":80835,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Truly...\""},{"lineNumber":80836,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今までよく、頑張りましたね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You've really done your best until now.\""},{"lineNumber":80837,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":80838,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわぁーん！　日光さんー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaah! Hikaru-san!\""},{"lineNumber":80839,"originalJapaneseLine":"そう時間も残されていない中、","translatedEnglishLine":"With only little time left,"},{"lineNumber":80840,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹達は別れの会話を最後の時間まで行った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki and the others continued their farewell conversation until the very end."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいえ、二人分入れる装置もあります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, there is also a device that can hold two people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎様さえよろしければ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If only Kentarou-sama is okay with it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「健太郎くん、いいの？　いいの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kentarou-kun, is it really okay? Really okay?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずーっと待ってもいいけど……
ただ待つだけなんて退屈だもんね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just waiting around would be boring, you know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なら美樹ちゃんと一緒に寝て待つよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then I'll sleep and wait together with Miki-chan."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹が健太郎の首に抱きつく。
「健太郎くんっ、ごめんね……うっ……
「でも、それがリトルプリンセスの判断なら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But if that is the Little Princess's decision,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは口を挟めないからな……」
美樹ちゃんの魔王化を止める手立て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to find a way to stop Miki-chan's demon transformation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必ず見つけなければいけないので」
ここでお別れなんだね……」
長い間、お疲れ様でした……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thank you for all your hard work over this long time..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう魔王化に苦しむことも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you won't suffer from demon transformation anymore...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人に恐れられて悲しむこともありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and you won't have to be feared or saddened by others."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今までよく、頑張りましたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You've really done your best until now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわぁーん！　日光さんー！」
そう時間も残されていない中、
美樹達は別れの会話を最後の時間まで行った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki and the others continued their farewell conversation until the very end.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
